item.description: On Thursday, February 16, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “A Critique of Plantinga’s ‘Darwin’s Doubt’ Argument,” a talk (via skype) by Tyler Wunder (Wilfrid Laurier University, Ontario) in celebration of Darwin Day. Reading: http://en.wikipedia.o.... Location: Rm. 442 in the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Darwin Day: Disproof atheism critique of Plantinga's "Darwin's Doubt" argument
